title: Grievous Wounds
body:
Hello Riot,

I've detected a problem, a bug or something else. I don't know call it, like however u want. 
Grievous Wounds don't work. I've played vs a Soraka with my premade and he was playin Twitch and bought the new Grievous Wounds Item for Adc, which inflicts grievous wounds while dealing physical dmg but with or without the debuff Soraka heal the same amount of Hp on her adc or other Teammates.

I hope others also noticed this problem/bug and help me to let riot know this porblem.

Greetings TheSmoker

replies.body: Ouuh, i see now thanks. But then its pretty useless isnt it? So it only works for self heals like {{champion:36}}  Ultimate?
Swain, Vladimir, Renekton and a bunch of Champion actually suffer against this Item.

Oh entschuldigt, 
^^ habe nicht aufgepasst. Ist dieser nerf auch auf Ignite gemacht worden, oder ist Ignite die einzige Möglichkeit Soraka heal bzw. allgemein Heals entgegenzuwirken?
Zumal ignite den gleichen effekt hat,also die klaffenden Wunden-ja.
Der einzige Counter zu Soraka ist : Töte Soraka.
